CustomField.formula: IF(IF( NOT( ISBLANK( animalos__Date_of_Birth__c ) ) , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( animalos__Date_of_Birth__c ) , DAY( animalos__Date_of_Birth__c ) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( animalos__Date_of_Birth__c ), YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( animalos__Date_of_Birth__c ) -1 ), 0) > 8, true, false)
CustomField.label: Senior Pet
